segments.text: Sure , I planted them . They're organic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Dad , how do you know how to plant organic vegetable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad , come on ! Just tell me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , honey , I can teach you how to plant them if you want to learn .
segments.speaker: S2
